body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ddTCHyz3Hmy4gH5dUjsXyCpMAmuHFxkz9qFwO07DHCbl5opYQzWYdVa*mF*vRbnozA8tmRdlQ6Mr9ih84atC3wHF*625mYtd/runitall.JPG)Hi, I was trying to run the Run It All component.
